name: Professions. Popular and exciting
description:
Hello! This is an exciting set of learning apps for boys and girls. It consists of kids games, which tell about different exciting professions. All the stories of this set are interesting and cognitive. We will try professions in the playing form and learn a lot of new and interesting things. Citizens from Hippo town and popular games for kids will help us.

Today the teacher in kindergarten prepared a surprise for Hippo and other kids. She decided to tell them about different interesting professions. Whom will emergency doctor treat in the hospital for kids? Where does the seller get sweets, candies and ice cream? What interesting races can the taxi driver organize? What does the fireman use to fight the fire? Where does the pilot hurry to help? How can the library make the development quicker, and what learning does the librarian need before working? Where does astronaut fly with his spaceship? The teacher answers all of these questions today. And to make the process of learning interesting, we will play interesting learning games for kids. What would you do: help patients like a real doctor or make children happy being ice cream seller? Or do you have mood to explore the space? Try our educational games and discover exciting cognitive professions!

Our kids games for boys and girls will make you happy and allow to spend useful time with your kid. Welcome to the world of exciting kids apps!
developers: Hippo Baby Games for Girls and for Boys
